name: Pushy Worm
description:
Made in 1 week for the 8 Bits to Infinity VimJam (Game Jam)

Jam Focus: Collectables
Theme: There and Back

Your kids are hungry. Use your puzzle skills to bring them back food.

Controls:
WASD or Arrow keys to move
U key to undo move
R key to restart level
ESC to return to menu
